resources.string:
"by Jack Twilley -- mathuin@gmail.com

New! Maidenhead locator system support has been added. The current grid square is displayed with the latitude and longitude.

HFBeacon is a simple application which informs the user which HF propagation beacon is transmitting at the present time. Beacon information was collected from http://www.ncdxf.org/beacons.html.

HFBeacon is open source software released under the MIT License.
"
Ranges and bearings will be displayed as soon as the application retrieves your current position.\n\nShould be just a moment!
To use HFBeacon, you must first turn on a Location source in Settings. Go to Settings and turn it on now?
